= Tentavie UI Mock-up =

== The estimation perspective ==

<img src="http://econference-planning-poker-plugin.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/img/Prospettiva_Stima.jpeg" width="700px" />


This perspective contains following views (numbered as in the perspective):

 # *Participants*: here are listed all partecipants;
 # *User Stories*: here are listed the stories that have to be estimated;
 # *Story Properties*: show the description of the story and all the meta-data associate with it, such us Owner, Priority and so on.
 # *Story Discussion*: here are stored conversation about questions asked from team members to the Product Owner, it could be useful during the estimation task;
 # *Card Deck*: here are the cards for estimating. User should select a card during the estimation task.

== The discussion about estimates perspective ==

<img src="http://econference-planning-poker-plugin.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/img/Prospettiva_Discussione_Stime.jpeg" width="700px" />

This perspective contains following views (numbered as in the perspective):

 # *Participants*.
 # *Story properties*.
 # *Story discussion*.
 # *Decision Place*: here the moderator write some inportant notes she thinks will be helpful when this story is being programmed and tested.
 # *Estimates*: here are listed cards selected by all estimators;
 # *Estimation Discussion*: here is visibile the discussion done, when cards score are different and it is necessary  re-estimate the story. Dicussion could made by chat, with a multichat window or using the ODR technique.
